scripts.build: bun run generate-images && bun build ./src/index.html --outdir=dist --public-path=/ --sourcemap --target=browser --minify --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --env='BUN_PUBLIC_*' && cp -r ./public/* ./dist
scripts.start: bun run generate-images && NODE_ENV=production bun src/index.tsx
